projects.title: Crapping data
projects.bodyText:
- Learn about proposed technology for the project development team.
 - Use nodejs to write an API to develop the function of crawling data from websites requested by customers. 
 - Use playwright to build auto login function, auto crawl data, run crawl data in parallel... Detect changes to the website and send notification emails.

projects.title: MyForex
projects.bodyText:
- API development for myForex market website 
 - Perform API writing tasks according to assigned requirements.
 - Support team members.
 - Complete the assigned task well.

projects.title: Blogs website
projects.bodyText:
- Use nodejs to develop functional API for the project.
 - Design admin page using React.
 - Create a function for admins to manage users who post the most, post section for admins, and like statistics.

projects.title: Rating app
projects.bodyText:
- Make a specific plan, divide tasks among team members, find documents related to the project, and build a project framework.
 - Use React to design the Admin admin page.
 - Support team members for self-testing, UT.
 - Use MongoDB user storage database.
 - Do chat with Socket using MongoDB, develop API functions for the website.
